sentences.sContent: They fear the public ignoring their jobs so that city services are not maintained, a discomfit to the elite.
sentences.sContent_eng: They fear the public ignoring their jobs so that city services are not maintained, a discomfit to the elite.
sentences.sCn: 他们也害怕公众不再去上班，导致城市服务无法维持，这种情况会扰乱精英们的计划。

synos.tran: 挫败；扰乱，破坏；使…为难；使…破灭

remMethod.val: dis(不) + comfit(看作comfort， 舒适) → 使不舒服 → 使难堪
